comments.body: I think I'd say something about the fact that no arguments were passed, but some are expected.
This line used for printing usage. next line checks for required arguments. Same pattern we are using in other tools.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +99,103 @@
    if (args.length == 0)
      CommandLineUtils.printUsageAndDie(parser, "A tool to test log compaction. Valid options are: ")

    CommandLineUtils.checkRequiredArgs(parser, options, brokerOpt, numMessagesOpt)
